    • connection

      public void connection(String ip, int port) throws IOException
      It starts the socket connection on the given ip and port.
      Parameters:
      ip - address of the connection.
      port - chosen port for the connection.

      IOException

    • listenSocket

    • elaborate

      public static void elaborate(String message) throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException, RemoteException, InterruptedException
      It elaborates the given message and creates the equivalent message type based on the action. It interacts with the instance of clientController and with the virtualView.
      Parameters:
      message - to be elaborated.
      Throws:
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      RemoteException
      InterruptedException

    • sendMessage

      public static void sendMessage(String message, boolean socket) throws RemoteException
      It checks if the message has the right format and sends it to server.
      Parameters:
      message - to be sent.
      socket - true if socket connection, false if RMI connection.
      Throws:
      RemoteException
